title: Manage Asset Decontamination
description: A piece of equipment that was in radioactive service needs to be decontaminated before it can be sent for repair.

tasks.description: Retrieve the decontamination procedure for the specific asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the approved procedure for cleaning the equipment.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the decontamination, ensuring the assigned personnel have the required radiation safety training.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the work order and verifies the qualifications of the assigned crew.

tasks.description: After cleaning, perform a radiation survey to confirm the asset is clean, and document the results before releasing it for repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the successful radiation survey results, clearing the equipment for general maintenance.
